CSL_Aif2LinkIndex CiSelect

Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2LinkSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of Retransmitter.

Field Documentation

Bool CSL_Aif2RtLinkSetup::bEnableEmptyMsg

The Empty Message Enable Bit configures the RT block to insert an empty message in the event that a message is discovered to have a code violation in the header. The configuration is valid in OBSAI mode only.

CSL_Aif2LinkIndex CSL_Aif2RtLinkSetup::CiSelect

The CI Select bits indicate the selected inbound link for the retransmitted data path

CSL_Aif2RtConfig CSL_Aif2RtLinkSetup::RtConfig

The RT Configuration field configures the mode of operation of the RT block
